Class CycleShiftsController

  • java.lang.Object

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/cycle-shifts")
public class CycleShiftsController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will handle all requests related to CycleShifts

    • Method Detail

      • getCycleShifts

        @GetMapping(value="")
public org.springframework.hateoas.CollectionModel<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<CycleShift>> getCycleShifts()
        This method will handle requests for all the available CycleShifts
        Returns:
        The found CycleShifts in the database

      • putCycleShifts

        @PutMapping(value="")
public org.springframework.hateoas.CollectionModel<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<CycleShift>> putCycleShifts(@RequestBody @Valid
                                                                                                                                             @Valid java.util.List<CycleShift> newCycleShifts)
        This method will handle requests to update all the CycleShifts This is, eliminating the current ones and replacing them with the provided ones. Only update the cycle shifts if they are valid. This is, not just being validated by the @Valid annotation, but all of the provided shifts have to have consecutive reference days. For example, if the smallest reference date provided is 15/4/2020 and there are 10 newCycleShifts, there has to exist a CycleShift with reference date 16/4/2020, 17/4/2020, 18/4/2020, ... 24/4/2020
        Returns:
        The updated CycleShifts

      • getCycleShift

        @GetMapping(value="/{referenceDate}")
public org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<CycleShift> getCycleShift(@PathVariable @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE)
                                                                                                               java.time.LocalDate referenceDate)
        This method will handle get requests of a single CycleShift, identified by its reference dates
        Parameters:
        referenceDate - the date used to identify the CycleShift
        Returns:
        The found CycleShift
        Throws:
        CycleShiftNotFoundException - whenever the requested CycleShift could no be found
